Flow.description: MVP1.0 This PB is the Master of all Case Automations for PD MVP1.0

value.stringValue: OR ( AND ( ISNEW(), [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PD_Case' ), AND ( ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, 'Re-open'), ISCHANGED([Case].Status) ) )

formulas.expression: OR ( AND ( ISNEW(), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'PD_Case' ), AND ( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, 'Re-open'), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}) ) )
